abstract.text: Several synchronization primitives and task synchronization mechanisms introduced to aid in modern swift concurrency.

inlineContent.text: While Swift’s modern structured concurrency provides safer way of managing concurrency, it lacks many synchronization and task management features in its current state.
aims to close the functionality gap by providing following features:
Introducing traditional synchronization primitives that work in non-blocking way with
Bridging with Grand Central Dispatch and allowing usage of GCD specific patterns with
Transferring data between multiple task boundaries with

requested without starting operation.

within provided deadline.

by representing task state and allowing task resuming with some value or error.
